title: Hotel industry deals surge 140% in H1 2023
description: The hotel industry in India experienced a significant increase in transactions, reaching $175 million in the first half of 2023, a 140% rise compared to the previous year. This growth was attributed to India's outlier status in the APAC market, where hotel deal volumes declined. The development pipeline has slowed down, leading to more trading of operating assets. Experts predict that India's hotel investments will continue to increase in the coming years, potentially reaching the level of markets like Thailand.
